name: lt2addd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))

comment: Adding both side of two inequalities. Theorem I.25 of [Apostol] p. 20. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
